attributes.action: Ban the selling of natural pine trees to be used as Christmas Tree
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Blair and the Environmental Minister, you, as the rest of the world well know, our planet is suffering disastrous climatic changes that is affecting all life forms induced by mankind. All conciencious inhabitants of this planet are concern about the future life. How is it going to be like in a 100 years time?.....A pine tree is a life form that is contributing to preserve life in its life cicle, in winter time it is one of the very few trees that preserve its foliage were birds and other creatures can refuge...
Cutting a tree for Christmas decoration  is cutting life forms short, contributing to cutting short the organic life of our planet. 

Long live to our natural habitat!!!
